Name: United Chronicles
About the game: United Chronicles is a new type of Tactical RPG which is characterized by real-time combat. In the combat of this game , there is no concept of 'Turn' and there are no 'Squares' on the field. Each unit is just controlled by 'Time' and 'Circle' ('Cool-down' and 'Max-range'). Enjoy this really stress-free Battle. 25 allies and 24 bosses (+ heroic mode) are waiting for you.
